resources.string: We are students at the University of Texas at Austin with a mission to help colorblind people and graphic designers with this app.

Take a photo or upload an image from your gallery, and find the closest color associated to a selected pixel. You can check the name, hexadecimal value, and RGB values of that color. You can also save your favorite colors in your Palette!
Disclaimer: Depending on the lighting of a photo or your camera quality, the color values returned may not be exactly true-to-life.
We hope you enjoy using Color Me This!
Are you sure you want to delete this color?
